hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Compass#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Zora Tunic#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Compass#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #Wolfos# guarding a chest.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Nayru's Love#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that Bongo Bongo really hates the cold.

HF (Open Grotto).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Zora Tunic#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #4# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of #gold#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Slingshot#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Goron Tunic# and #a Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #the Lens of Truth#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Bow#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Slingshot#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block First Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.
